content:
You're making great progress in Pokémon Sword! Reaching the third gym is a significant milestone, and catching 50 Pokémon is a fantastic start to completing your Pokédex.

At this point, you've probably encountered a variety of Pokémon, from common ones like Pidgey and Rattata to some of the more rare and elusive ones. Have you had any exciting encounters or surprises while exploring the Wild Area?

Completing the Pokédex is a challenging but rewarding task. You'll need to explore every nook and cranny of the Galar region, battle other trainers, and participate in Max Raid Battles to catch 'em all. Don't forget to visit the Pokémon Center regularly to heal your Pokémon and stock up on Poké Balls and other useful items.

As you continue your journey, you'll encounter more powerful Pokémon and tougher opponents. Make sure to train your Pokémon well and choose the right strategies to overcome the challenges ahead.

Which Pokémon are you currently using in your team, and what's your favorite Pokémon so far? Are you focusing on building a team with a specific type advantage or just catching as many Pokémon as you can?

Remember, the Pokémon world is full of surprises, so keep exploring, battling, and catching those Pokémon!
